Here’s the updated description for your extension:

Comment System - Decentralized Commenting Powered by Blockchain

Description:
The Comment System is a Web3-powered browser extension that allows users to leave comments on any webpage they visit, with interactions securely stored on the blockchain for transparency, accountability, and immutability. Whether browsing news articles, blogs, or e-commerce websites, this extension empowers users to add comments, upvote/downvote others’ comments, and report inappropriate content, all while ensuring transparency through blockchain technology.

Key Features:

	•	Decentralized Commenting:
Leave and read comments directly on any website. Comments are stored immutably on the blockchain, ensuring they cannot be tampered with or deleted by centralized entities.
	•	Upvote/Downvote System:
Users can upvote or downvote comments based on their quality and relevance. These interactions influence the commenter’s on-chain reputation score.
	•	Reputation Tracking:
A built-in reputation system rewards users for constructive engagement and penalizes those with inappropriate behavior. Reputation is stored on-chain, making it transparent and secure.
	•	Report Inappropriate Content:
Users can flag comments that violate community standards, contributing to a decentralized moderation system. Reported comments may be hidden based on community consensus.
	•	Dashboard Modes:
The extension offers both a minimal mode for quick interactions and a full dashboard for detailed engagement, giving users flexibility in how they interact with the system.
	•	Dark Mode Interface:
A sleek, user-friendly dark mode ensures seamless integration with your browsing experience.
	•	Secure and Transparent Interactions:
All actions, including commenting, upvoting, downvoting, and reporting, are permanently recorded on the blockchain, preventing any central authority from censoring or manipulating user interactions.

Permissions:

	•	Active Tab:
Allows the extension to interact with the active tab, enabling comments and interactions on any webpage you visit.
	•	Scripting:
Injects the comment interface into webpages for a smooth and responsive user experience.

Getting Started:
To begin using the Comment System, connect your Web3 wallet when prompted. Once connected, you can seamlessly comment, upvote, downvote, and report content as you browse the web.

Why Use Comment System?

	•	Ownership of Comments:
Your comments are stored on the blockchain, ensuring that they can’t be altered or removed by website administrators.
	•	Transparent Reputation System:
Earn and track your reputation on-chain, building credibility through positive engagement.
	•	Complete Transparency:
With all interactions recorded immutably on the blockchain, you get a truly transparent and tamper-proof platform for online commentary.

Install the Comment System extension today to experience decentralized commenting, reputation tracking, and content moderation in an innovative Web3 environment!

This description should satisfy the requirements and provide a clear overview of your extension’s functionality and benefits.
